Sentencas: The electric potential profile and the temperature profile across a formation cell have been derived for the first time, using irreversible thermodynamics for bulk and surface systems.
Titulo: Jumps in electric potential and in temperature at the electrode surfaces of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The method was demonstrated with the solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Jumps in electric potential and in temperature at the electrode surfaces of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The expression for the cell potential reduces to the classical formula when we assume equilibrium for polarized oxygen atoms across the electrolyte.
Titulo: Jumps in electric potential and in temperature at the electrode surfaces of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Using data from the Literature, we show for some likely assumptions, how the cell potential is generated at the anode, and how the energy is dissipated throughout the cell.
Titulo: Jumps in electric potential and in temperature at the electrode surfaces of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The thermal gradient amounts to 5 x 10(8) Km(-1) when the current density is 10(4) Am-2 and the thermal resistance of the surface scales like the electrical resistance.
Titulo: Jumps in electric potential and in temperature at the electrode surfaces of the solid oxide fuel cell
